title: Oh!Mg | Relax Dream Repair | Evening Magnesium
body_html:
Oh!Mg is a multi-pathway magnesium complex designed to calm both body and mind, ease muscle tension, and support deep, restorative sleep.

Benefits:

  • Relaxation & Calm: Reduces nervous system stress and muscular tension before bedtime.

  • Natural Sleep Support: Lemon Balm and L-Theanine encourage GABA production, helping you fall asleep faster and wake up refreshed.

  • Overnight Recovery: Zinc and B vitamins support neurotransmitter balance and cellular repair during deep sleep phases.

  • High Bioavailability: Features three highly absorbable forms of magnesium — bisglycinate, taurate, and lactate — for optimal uptake and gentle digestion.

  • Calming Berry Essence: A light berry aroma that enhances evening relaxation.

Ingredients:
Magnesium bisglycinate, Magnesium lactate, Magnesium taurate, Lemon Balm extract, L-Theanine, Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine hydrochloride), Vitamin B5 (Calcium D-pantothenate), Zinc glycinate, Hydroxypropyl methylcellulose (Capsule shell), Microcrystalline cellulose (Bulking agent), Berry Scented.

title: Day & Night Bundle
body_html:
The Day & Night Bundle is a complete 24-hour longevity system designed to fuel energy and focus during the day and restore calm, deep sleep, and recovery at night. Together, these three formulas optimise cellular energy, neurotransmitter balance, and restorative rest for long-term performance and resilience.

Benefits:

  • Energises cells for daytime performance and focus.

  • Supports neurotransmitter balance and cognitive clarity.

  • Promotes natural relaxation and deep, restorative sleep.

  • Enhances overnight recovery and DNA repair.

  • Strengthens long-term cellular and metabolic health.

Includes:

  • NMN 500mg – NMN, Vegetable Cellulose Capsule.

  • NAD⁺ Brain – Myo-inositol, Ascorbic acid, Citicoline, Green Tea Extract (60% L-Theanine), L-Tyrosine, Phosphatidylserine (carrier: Soy Lecithin), Fisetin, Apigenin, Caffeine (25 mg per capsule), Zinc Gluconate, Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine HCl), Vitamin B5 (Calcium D-Pantothenate).
     Contains traces of soy (from Phosphatidylserine carrier).

  • Oh!Mg Magnesium – Vegetable cellulose capsule, Magnesium bisglycinate, Magnesium taurate, Magnesium lactate, Lemon Balm extract, L-Theanine, Zinc gluconate, Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine hydrochloride), Vitamin B5 (Calcium D-pantothenate), Microcrystalline cellulose.

All products are Vegan, Halal, Non-GMO, and Allergen-Free.
Free from gluten, soy*, nuts, fish, shellfish, and dairy.
Third-party tested and packaged in a GMP & ISO9001-certified UK facility.
NMN Bio is founded by a scientist and committed to full transparency and quality.
(*NAD⁺ Brain contains soy traces.)

title: NAD+ Brain | Healthy Brain Aging | Nootropic
body_html:
NAD+  Brain is a nootropic blend formulated to enhance focus, mental clarity, and long-term cognitive health.

Benefits:

  • Focus & Clarity: Caffeine and L-Theanine improve alertness and concentration without jitters.

  • Mood Support: Choline and Inositol balance neurotransmitters for calm focus.

  • Cell Protection: Fisetin, Apigenin, and Vitamin C protect brain cells from oxidative stress.

  • Memory & Learning: Phosphatidylserine and L-Tyrosine support recall, learning, and cognitive flexibility.

  • Neural Plasticity: Fisetin promotes adaptability and new neural connections.

Ingredients:
Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine Hydrochloride), Pantothenic Acid (Calcium D-Pantothenate), Zinc (as Zinc Gluconate), Apigenin, Caffeine, Citicoline, Fisetin, Inositol, L-Theanine, L-Tyrosine, Phosphatidylserine, Microcrystalline Cellulose (Bulking agent), Bamboo Silica (Anti-caking agent), Vegetable Capsule Shell (Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose).

body_html:

title: 7 Longevity Tips to Slow Down Your Aging
body_html: Get your free guide on the most important things that move the needle and can slow down the aging process within 30 days. Curated by Dr Elena Seranova, this guide takes you through the basics of longevity, with some tips costing £0 to implement on a daily basis!
